title: Oh, look, another leave because of this.
body:
https://i.gyazo.com/fb36bc07638b4ff7657ef96cac7b4df1.png

I mean, what a fantastic client. I never had these types of issues on the old client. This is the fourth fucking time in 2 days and nothing has been done. I have to deal with the client just force closing during the game or loading and then I get this crap.

FIX IT

replies.body: It was patched this morning though, Send a ticket into Riot they might be able to help if you got lowpri from a client bug

They pretty much said that I should change my settings on my computer to avoid future lag. They also said that they would not revoke the low priority as: "The only way to remove your Leaverbuster status is by playing games from start to finish without interruptions." They also stated this: "We understand that emergencies can occur outside of our control which may take us out of the game, thatâ€™s why Leaverbuster is designed to only take action after a series of incidents have been observed." and as I played more games and experienced the bug several times I was put in this low priority....
I'm in low priority because of this and bugs previously made me leave too. So 20 mins before 5 games! rip old client
aw poor you, can't be toxic and report people for non-offensive names. :^)
